post_content:
*** Card is SOLD***

I am looking to sell or cash+trade my Red Cobb Polar Bear.

I'm camping overnight on Friday. So be patient. Email me at: [url]todeen1@gmail.com[/url] 

Straight sale $3000 OBO. This is based on VCP price guide.

***Card is SOLD***

For a trade I would like approximately $2000 cash, but that's negotiable. For a trade I'm looking for:
1) 1921 Exhibit star name
2) 1954 Jackie Robinson
3) T202 Tris Speaker any variation
4) T205 Tris Speaker
5) Star name Tom Barker game
6) B18 Felt (Johnson or Cobb)
7) T202 Cobb any variation
8) Lou Gehrig Wheaties, fielding position
9) Tris Speaker Caramel Cards
10) Tris Speaker strip cards
